summary: THERE ARE 6 RECALLS ON THIS GEM OF A CAR, NEVER RECEIVED ANY FROM KIA, PINION STEERING IS 1 OF THEM, DRIVING ON A SATURDAY MORNING VEERING RIGHT AND CAR JUMPED ON IT'S OWN LOSS CONTROL OF STEERING CAR IT CURB AND TIRE AND RIM I AM GUESSING OTHER DAMAGE, HAD CAR TOWED TO KIA DEALER ON8-8-16 STILL THERE BECAUSE THEY ARE WAITING SOMEONE FROM THE HEAD OF KIA DAMAGE CONTROL TO COME, THEY TOLD THEY WOULD BE THERE LAST WEEK STILL NOBODY HAS COME OUT, I NEED MY CAR TO WORK HOW CAN THERE BE 6 RECALLS ON A CAR THAT IS LESS THAN 2 YEARS OLD BAD ENOUGH THEY PASSED IT THRU INSPECTION WITH A STEERING ISSUE, PLEASE HELP,
